Error Conditions (responseState.ErrorCode): 0=OK [validation warnings can appear in errorItems] 26=Unknown bank 70=Technical error 6000=Validation error [When this ErrorCode is received, you need to check responseState.errorItem for the specific error items, shown below] 6438=Unknown transaction id (Update/Read) 6439=Not a unique payment. Validations warnings (can be found in responseState.errorItem)[payment is stored, user can either ignore warning or do an Update operation to act on those warnings.]: 6404=Requested execution date has passed. </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BaseOneRate"> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:fractionDigits value="10"/> <xs:totalDigits value="11"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Amount_SimpleType_NoFractions"> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:fractionDigits value="0"/> <xs:totalDigits value="12"/> <xs:minInclusive value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ChargeBearerTypeCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="DEBT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>All transaction charges are to be borne by the debtor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="CRED"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>All transaction charges are to be borne by the creditor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SHAR"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>In a credit transfer context, means that transaction charges on the sender side are to be borne by the debtor, transaction charges on the receiver side are to be borne by the creditor. In a direct debit context, means that transaction charges on the sender side are to be borne by the creditor, transaction charges on the receiver side are to be borne by the debtor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SLEV"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Charges are to be applied following the rules agreed in the service level and/or scheme.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ChargeInfoTypeCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="TOTP"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Total amount in base currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="TOTA"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Total amount in account currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DNBP"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Product charge specified in base currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DNBT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Product charge specified in the transfer currency deducted from the transfer amount. Pertains only to outgoing payments where charges on the sender side are to be borne by the beneficiary.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="OURP"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Charges on the beneficiary side to be borne by the sender in base currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="OURA"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Charges on the beneficiary side to be borne by the sender in account currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PRO1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>From ProFX: 1 = Debited account separately.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PRO2"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>From ProFX: 2 = Accumulated and debited/invoiced at intervals.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PRO3"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>From ProFX: 3 = Fees deducted from transferred amount.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PriorityCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="SPOT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Exchange rate applied is the rate agreed between the parties.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SALE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Exchange rate applied is the market rate at the time of the sale.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="AGRD"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Exchange rate applied is the rate agreed between the parties.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v4" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v4" xmlns:st="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v3"> <xs:import namespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v3"/> <xs:complexType name="PartyIdentification"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: Set of elements used to identify a person or an organisation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="st:Max140Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Name by which a party is known and which is usually used to identify that party."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="postalAddress" type="tns:PostalAddress"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="faxNumber" type="st:PhoneNumber"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="emailAddress" type="st:Max254Text"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="contactDetailsName" type="st:Max140Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Name of person to receive information."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PostalAddress"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>PAYS can do validations against the country code (depending on which party/agent type it is). All other fields is information only, and is sent to Payment Engine without any form of validation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="addressType" type="tns:AddressTypeCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO "Identifies the nature of the postal address. Values: ADDR, PBOX, HOME, BIZZ, MLTO, DLVY</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="department" type="st:Max70Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Identification of a division of a large organisation or building."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="subDepartment" type="st:Max70Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Identification of a sub-division of a large organisation or building."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="streetName" type="st:Max70Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Name of a street or thoroughfare."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="buildingNumber" type="st:Max16Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Number that identifies the position of a building on a street."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="postCode" type="st:Max16Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Identifier consisting of a group of letters and/or numbers that is added to a postal address to assist the sorting of mail."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="townName" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Name of a built-up area, with defined boundaries, and a local government."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="countrySubDivision" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Identifies a subdivision of a country such as state, region, county."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="country" type="st:CountryCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Nation with its own government."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="7" minOccurs="0" name="addressLine" type="st:Max70Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services, presented in free format text."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="AddressTypeCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="ADDR"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is the complete postal address.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PBOX"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is a postal office (PO) box.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="HOME"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is the home address.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="BIZZ"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is the business address.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="MLTO"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is the address to which mail is sent.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DLVY"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is the address to which delivery is to take place.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="FinancialInstitutionIdentification"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Set of elements used to uniquely and unambiguously identify a financial institution or a branch of a financial institution."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="bic" type="st:BICFIIdentifier"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Code allocated to a financial institution by the ISO 9362 Registration Authority as described in ISO 9362; Banking - Banking telecommunication messages - Business identifier code (BIC)."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="nationalId" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Depending on validations against PBD, will be mapped against the following ISO fields: 1: MemberIdentification - "Identification of a member of a clearing system" 2: Other - ""Unique identification of an agent, as assigned by an institution, using an identification scheme Regarding 1, PAYS will also add a ClearingSystemIdentification to uniquely identify the agent within the correct clearing system of that country. This ID can be found in ISO's ExternalCodeList overview.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="st:Max140Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Name by which an agent is known and which is usually used to identify that agent."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="postalAddress" type="tns:PostalAddress"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ExchangeRate"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="exchangeRate" type="st:BaseOneRate"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "The factor used for conversion of an amount from one currency to another. This reflects the price at which one currency was bought with another currency.""</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element default="SPOT" minOccurs="0" name="rateType" type="st:ExchangeRateTypeCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Specifies the type used to complete the currency exchange." Values: SPOT, SALE, AGRD</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="contractIdentification" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Unique and unambiguous reference to the foreign exchange contract agreed between the initiating party/creditor and the debtor agent."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentIdentification"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="messageIdentification" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Point to point reference, as assigned by the instructing party, and sent to the next party in the chain to unambiguously identify the message." Usage: The instructing party has to make sure that MessageIdentification is unique per instructed party for a pre-agreed period.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="endToEndIdentification" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Unique identification assigned by the initiating party to unumbiguously identify the transaction. This identification is passed on, unchanged, throughout the entire end-to-end chain. " NB! endToendIdentification will remain unchanged in updates (as opposed to other ids return in create response. This field is therefore a good canditate to follow a payment in audit trail.)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AmountTypeChoice"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="instructedAmount" type="tns:Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Amount of money to be moved between the debtor and creditor, before deduction of charges, expressed in the currency as ordered by the initiating party."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="equivalentAmount" type="tns:EquivalentAmount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Amount of money to be moved between the debtor and creditor, expressed in the currency of the debtor's account, and the currency in which the amount is to be moved.""</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="EquivalentAmount"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="amount" type="tns:Amount"/> <xs:element name="currencyOfTransfer" type="st:ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Specifies the currency of the to be transferred amount, which is different from the currency of the debtor's account."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Account"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Provides the details to identify an account.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="identification" type="st:Max34Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Account identifier; IBAN or other generic identifier</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="currency" type="st:ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identification of the currency in which the account is held.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Amount"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="amount" type="st:Amount_SimpleType"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="currency" type="st:ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AmountOptionalCurrency"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="amount" type="st:Amount_SimpleType"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="currency" type="st:ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode" use="optional"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentAmounts"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Contains information regarding debit and credit amount along with counter values and conversionRate info. At least one of debitCounterValue and creditCounterValue is always set. This information is always recalculated in Read/Search</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="debitAmount" type="tns:Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount to be deducted from the debtor, expressed in the debtor account currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="creditAmount" type="tns:Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount to be transferred to the creditor, expressed in the transfer currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="debitCounterValue" type="tns:Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount to be deducted from the debtor, expressed in the base currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="creditCounterValue" type="tns:Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount to be transferred to the creditor, expressed in the base currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="conversionRateInfo" type="tns:ConversionRateInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Rate used to convert between the debit and credit amount.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ConversionRateInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="rate" type="st:BaseOneRate"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "The factor used for conversion of an amount from one currency to another. This reflects the price at which one currency was bought with another currency."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="type" type="tns:ConversionRateTypeCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Specifies the type of rate used when performing exchange rate conversion." Values: NONE, AGREED_RATE, SELL_RATE, BUY_RATE, MID_RATE, CROSS_RATE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="unitNumber"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Describes the unit number. Possible values: 1 and 100.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:enumeration value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="100"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ConversionRateTypeCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="NONE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>No conversion has been done.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="AGREED_RATE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Conversion has been done using an agreed rate.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SELL_RATE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Conversion has been done using a sell rate.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="BUY_RATE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Conversion has been done using a buy rate.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="MID_RATE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Conversion has been done using a mid rate.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="CROSS_RATE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Conversion has been done using a cross rate.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="RegulatoryReporting"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Information needed due to regulatory and statutory requirements.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code" type="st:Max10Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Specifies the nature, purpose, and reason for the transaction to be reported for regulatory and statutory requirements in a coded form. Values: CHQB, HOLD, PHOB, TELB</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="instructionInformation" type="st:Max140Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Further information complementing the coded instruction or instruction to the creditor's agent that is bilaterally agreed or specific to a user community."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="InstructionForCreditorAgentCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="CHQB"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(Ultimate) creditor must be paid by cheque.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="HOLD"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount of money must be held for the (ultimate) creditor, who will call. Pay on identification.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PHOB"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Please advise/contact (ultimate) creditor/claimant by phone</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="TELB"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Please advise/contact (ultimate) creditor/claimant by the most efficient means of telecommunication.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="Approval"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="dateOfApproval" type="st:ISODate"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="approverFirstName" type="st:Max35Text"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="approverLastName" type="st:Max35Text"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Approver"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="approverFirstName" type="st:Max35Text"/> <xs:element name="approverLastName" type="st:Max35Text"/> <xs:element name="identification" type="st:Max35Text"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="EinvoiceDetails"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>NON-ISO field All details regarding eInvoice.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="invoiceReference" type="st:Max18Long"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Unique reference of eInvoice.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="providerId" type="st:ProviderId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>eInvoice provider</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="brandId" type="st:BrandId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Additional id of an eInvoice provider, e.g 001, 002</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ReferredDocumentInformation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Set of elements used to identify the documents referred to in the remittance information." Typical use: invoice details</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="type" type="st:ReferredDocumentType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Specifies the type of referred document." Values: CINV, CREN Default: CINV</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="issuer" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Identification of the issuer of the reference document type"</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="number" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Unique and unambiguous identification of the referred document."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="relatedDate" type="st:ISODate"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Date associated with the referred document."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="invoiceeOtherId" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Identification of the party to whom an invoice is issued, when it is different from the debtor or ultimate debtor."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="RemittanceInformation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Information supplied to enable the matching of an entry with the items that the transfer is intended to settle, such as commercial invoices in an accounts' receivable system."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="remittanceInformationUnstructured" type="st:Max140Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Information supplied to enable the matching/reconciliation of an entry with the items that the payment is intended to settle, such as commercial invoices in an accounts' receivable system, in an unstructured form."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="remittanceInformationStructured" type="tns:RemittanceInformationStructured"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Information supplied to enable the matching/reconciliation of an entry with the items that the payment is intended to settle, such as commercial invoices in an accounts' receivable system, in a structured form."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="RemittanceInformationStructured"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="referredDocumentInformation" type="tns:ReferredDocumentInformation"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="referredDocumentAmount" type="tns:ReferredDocumentAmount"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="creditorReferenceInformation" type="tns:CreditorReferenceInformation"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="3" minOccurs="0" name="additionalRemittanceInformation" type="st:Max140Text"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ReferredDocumentAmount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Provides details on the amounts of the referred document.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="duePayableAmount" type="tns:Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount specified is the exact amount due and payable to the creditor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="creditNoteAmount" type="tns:Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount specified for the referred document is the amount of a credit note.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="remittedAmount" type="tns:Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount specified for the referred document is the amount of a credit note.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CreditorReferenceInformation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Reference information provided by the creditor to allow the identification of the underlying documents.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="type" type="st:CreditorReferenceInformationType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type of creditor reference, in a coded form Values: DISP, FXDR, PUOR, RADM, RPIN, SCOR</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="issuer" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Entity that assigns the credit reference type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="reference" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Unique reference, as assigned by the creditor, to unambiguously refer to the payment transaction.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ChequeInstruction"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Set of elements needed to issue a cheque."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="chequeType" type="st:ChequeType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Specifies the type of cheque to be issued." Values: BCHQ</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="deliveryMethod" type="st:DeliveryMethodType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Specifies the delivery method of the cheque by the debtor's agent." Values: MLCD</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="chequeFrom" type="tns:chequeIdentificationType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Identifies the party that ordered the issuance of the cheque."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="deliverTo" type="tns:chequeIdentificationType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Party to whom the debtor's agent needs to send the cheque"</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="chequeIdentificationType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="st:Max140Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO "Name by which a party is known and is usually used to identify that identity."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="postalAddress" type="tns:PostalAddress"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO "Postal address of a party"</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="listTransactionResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Placeholder for possible error codes for each transaction within a PaymentListCreate</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="instructionIdentification" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Transaction id, as given by the client.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="transactionId" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Transaction id, as generated by underlying DB.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="errorItem" type="tns:errorItemType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>List of error codes.
